WRITING.TITLE: 'No Comment'
WRITING.TEXT: So earlier I looked at the source code for Scott's website and it just said no comment over and over in the first part. I dont know if it means anything but i thought i should bring it up in the subreddit anyway
Ah right, i dont usually check the source code haha
GTLive is streaming rn I dont know if its in full though, it maybe in two parts. Youtube is messing up with me though so not sure if it'll work for you or anythin. Worth a look?

The only problem with it being the older brother is the height then. Like for example when you run to the doors or closet you seem to be pretty small like a child's size. Good idea though! It would make a lot of sense if the height matches up
I think its where you go to reset your town. I havent done it myself yet though but there is a post on the subreddit it shud be close to the top but theres a full explanation on how to on there

Yes and no, if the items are things u cant buy again then just drop em off with a reliable friend until ur new town is set up. The money is worth it though if you get a good price, you can get your town appraised without having to sell it though if you want to! Just be careful when you do
About 11:45 i think

It #8217;s a podcast so I assume iTunes, google play, places like that. Probably be put on YouTube as well at a guess. It #8217;s called Dragons in places (I think... it #8217;s on their twitter either way) goes up some time tomorrow (25th)
What game is that???
Oh right thanks :) sadly I #8217;m on an iPhone though :/
Nah it #8217;s ok I #8217;ll just wait til next month. Thanks for the help though!
It #8217;s her character in the DnD Dice, Camera, Action livestreams. They #8217;re on YouTube just search up the name and they #8217;re all on the DND youtube page :)

Charlie is described as having brown hair in the books though and the girl had blonde hair (or at least that #8217;s what it looks like to me) and the style is very 80s looking in the sense that it is curled in a specific way so I think it #8217;s more likely to be Susie than Charlie :)
She #8217;s one of the names on the gravestones unlocked after one of the endings (I think it #8217;s the lore master one) :)
U can go to their website for it. It was linked in a post on their Instagram a while back if you want to check that though :)
They ran out of time, it was either the students killed him or the government did. They had only got a few hours left before he would have blown up the Earth
Ah right, it wasn #8217;t explained very well in the anime and I #8217;ve only just started the mangas. Thanks for correcting me :)
Do you mean the Tell Tale Game? If so then it #8217;s explained soon enough :)
You also missed Liberation, highly underrated in my opinion :(

You should try Liberation as well if you liked 3! It #8217;s set in America as well and the same time as 3 (maybe slightly later than the game) but it #8217;s in New Orleans with Aveline. If you have a ps3 you can get it in the American Saga collection, that #8217;s how I got it. It #8217;s a really great game that a lot of people don #8217;t seem to acknowledge at all cuz it was a PSP exclusive at one point.

I don #8217;t know really, it might be though. It #8217;s definitely something you should look into! I don #8217;t want to give anything away but if you liked 3 then you will love a specific level in liberation ;)
There #8217;s 2 live action movies as well :)
The tentacles changed him, he didn #8217;t choose it
There is a box set available but I can only confirm that for the UK :)
None of the NCIS/ Bull shows have had a renewal announcement yet so nothing to worry about yet hopefully! :)

This sounds really stupid but me and a friend have been changing Disney song lyrics to fit to assassin #8217;s creed games #128514;. We have Mary Poppins for Syndicate (Evie is Mary, Jacob is Bert, the rooks are the other chimney sweeps), our fave song for that is Step In Time (it got weird very fast and involved Connor yelling where #8217;s Charles lee!? For one verse). For 3 though I actually find Pocahontas fits very well as she jumps from the waterfall at the beginning of the movie which looks a lot like a leap of faith. That and the whole movie reminds me of AC3 :)
And Liberation
In England the 3rd season airs on Saturday :)

It #8217;s probably just because there is no actual news about it now, it takes ages to write something like that and since the last news we heard was that it was going through rewrites I #8217;d say there #8217;s probably just nothing to report at the moment :)
I hope everything gets better for you soon, you deserve it :)

I know how it feels to lose your mom to cancer so I know how horrible it is to go through that. I found out recently that I wasn #8217;t even supposed to have been told she was dying and been able to go an see her at all (I was 9). It feels horrible and I know that it #8217;s horrible to lose friends as well. It #8217;s such a crap time for you by the sounds of things and I want you to know that you #8217;re not alone :)

I know how it feels to lose your mom to cancer so I know how horrible it is to go through that. I found out recently that I wasn #8217;t even supposed to have been told she was dying and been able to go an see her at all (I was 9). It feels horrible and I know that it #8217;s horrible to lose friends as well. It #8217;s such a crap time for you by the sounds of things and I want you to know that you #8217;re not alone :)

WRITING.TITLE: Ultimate bug?
WRITING.TEXT: Has anyone else been experiencing a bug where the ultimate voice line from both teams including the character you #8217;re playing as don #8217;t say their ult voice lines? It doesn #8217;t happen all the time but has happened quite often to both me and a friend who I play with. We both play on PS4 and it #8217;s only been happening since the last patch.

WRITING.TITLE: Issues with rivals crew XP (PS4)
WRITING.TEXT: So I #8217;ve tried to play the rivals songs for this week and every time I #8217;ve finished a song I #8217;m getting no crew XP and no player XP. I figured it could of been something with their servers last night (I live in England) since it was at the start of the challenge but when I #8217;ve tried again today it #8217;s still not working. I #8217;ve tried going onto the online tab as well and it keeps saying that the client failed to reach the server but the internet is fine since I was playing on overwatch just before switching games and had no problems with that. It also keeps loading the end of challenge screen and sending me to rivals when I #8217;m on the menu even though I #8217;ve already seen it. I did check the rivals tab before starting both nights and still having the same issue. It also keeps coming up with #8220;failed to connect to rock band servers #8221; when I #8217;m loading up the rivals tab but works if I click it again afterwards. I #8217;ve contacted customer support but any help fixing the issue or at least getting some kind of understanding would be a great help. Thanks in advance

I #8217;m 19 and I #8217;m going on my own as well! As long as you #8217;re careful, keep your phone close and charged and have a safe zone to get to if any thing were to happen (and that #8217;s very unlikely) and you have someone picking you up then you #8217;ll be fine :)
I haven #8217;t ever switched crews and it sucks now cuz I really wanna help with it since we have a good shot at bloodstone :(, thanks for the quick response :)
I believe the stalls are on the ground floor and the circle is the balcony area above but there should be a map on the website of the arena that will show you the seating plan :)
Theyve already remastered the Jak and Daxter series, it #8217;s on ps store :)

If you live in England then anything outside of Europe that costs more than #163;15 will have customs sadly. Just some advise for future purchases so you #8217;re more prepared for it :) there #8217;s more details on the gov website if you search it on google :)
Actually Billie Joe #8217;s dad died on the 10th, not the 1st :)
My game still says it #8217;s on 1.01 (update outside of the game menu) and even when checking for updates it says there is nothing for it!
I ordered it on the 19th August and am a bit concerned cuz I never received a confirmation email but have gotten a paypal receipt... emailed the support asking about it already.
He #8217;s stated on his twitter that he will post it tomorrow :)
https://twitter.com/jack_septic_eye/status/1045389722544005120?s=21 :)
They said that the last few preorders haven #8217;t been shipped yet cuz they ran out of stock so they #8217;re dispatching those on 1st October :)

No but I have received an email that #8217;s said that they had some delays in shipping the last few orders since they ran out of stock and were supposed to be shipping the last ones on the 1st October. They #8217;ve said that they should be shipped by the end of this week now but who knows really, they #8217;ve been having troubles because of the storms. Hope this helps you :)

The dispatch email will come with a tracking link. The actual time for delivery differs, they should have some FAQs that will tell you the time window on the CDBaby website if you look on there :) Edit: be prepared for those customs when the album actually arrived, it #8217;s gonna be a lot. It will come from Royal Mail so you will get a card through before the actual delivery which will tell you how much and how to pay. Just in case you don #8217;t know, I had to pay a lot for the customs when my NSP bundle arrived and it came as a bit of a shock.
Do you mean on the app? If so you do have to buy them, yes. If it's on console or pc then no it should be there automatically.

WRITING.TITLE: All I did was exit full screen...

WRITING.TEXT: I understand where you're coming from. My self harming has been getting worse progressively over the last 3 years and recently it's gotten to a stage of using a craft knife to cut myself with. Every time I do it it gets lighter cuz I'm so scared about going too deep and people finding out. I had a friend who told me he used one before and ended up in a amp;e because of it. When I look at them and how shallow they are I end up doing more after a few hours but they're still getting lighter. But I know you can get past your troubles. Even if it takes a long time, I'm sure you can do it. I'm proud of you for still breathing today. Just keep trying to move forward, keep trying to jump over that pirhana plant to get to the flag and save the princess. You can get through this!
